zeta.title: ZETA
zeta.description: ZETA is the native staking, gas and governance token of ZetaChain

zrc20.title: ZRC-20
zrc20.description: Native gas and supported ERC-20 tokens from connected chains are represented as ZRC-20 on ZetaChain

erc20.title: ERC-20
erc20.description: ZetaChain's universal EVM supports standard ERC-20 tokens
